mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_NAME FROM ROOM GROUP BY ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_NAME ORDER BY ROOM_TYPE

SELECT ROWNUM, ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_FAC_NAME, ROOM_CONTENT, ROOM_SIZE, ROOM_BEDTYPE, ROOM_CHK_INTIME, ROOM_CHK_OUTTIME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_IMGS_FILE FROM (SELECT
R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FAC_NAME, R.ROOM_CONTENT, R.ROOM_SIZE, R.ROOM_BEDTYPE, R.ROOM_CHK_INTIME, R.ROOM_CHK_OUTTIME, MIN(R.ROOM_PRICE) ROOM_PRICE, regexp_replace(LISTAGG(M.ROOM_IMGS_FILE, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY M.ROOM_IMGS_FILE),'([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1') ROOM_IMGS_FILE FROM ROOM R , ROOM_IMAGES M WHERE R.ROOM_TYPE = M.ROOM_TYPE AND R.ROOM_TYPE = #{ROOM_TYPE} GROUP BY
R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FAC_NAME, R.ROOM_CONTENT, R.ROOM_SIZE, R.ROOM_BEDTYPE, R.ROOM_CHK_INTIME, R.ROOM_CHK_OUTTIME, R.ROOM_PRICE) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
